content.question: Which of the following is the correct mathematical expression to use to calculate the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of a <math alttext="0.10 molar" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.10</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> aqueous <math alttext="B a open parenthesis O H close parenthesis 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Ba(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> solution at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="p H equals the negative log of 0.10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mtext>log(0.10)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="p H equals the negative log of 0.20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mtext>log(0.20)</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals 14.00 minus the log of 0.10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>−</mo><mtext>log(0.10)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of 0.20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mtext>log(0.20)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="p H equals 14.00 plus the log of 0.20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>14.00</mn><mo>+</mo><mtext>log(0.20)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.2: pH and pOH of Strong Acids and Bases

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
